press_handle_down.description: Press down the handle of the suitcase.

press_handle_up.description: Press up the handle of the suitcase.

wipe_handle.description: Wipe the handle of the suitcase to clean it.

clean_handle.description: Clean the suitcase handle if it is dirty.

wipe_suitcase_body.description: Wipe the body of the suitcase to clean it.

clean_suitcase_body.description: Clean the suitcase body to remove any dust or other particles.

clean_suitcase.description: Clean the entire suitcase, including all surfaces and the handle.

handle_operation.description: Operate the handle of the suitcase by pushing it down and pulling it up.

clean_whole_suitcase.description: Clean the entire suitcase including the suitcase handle and body.
